scan_table_check.description: A Role should have a valid name. A name should consist of at least 3 lowercase letter, numeric and underscore characters and start with a letter and end with a letter or numeric character. For roles defined in global applicatons the rule applies to the "name" field. For roles defined in scoped applications the rule applies to the "suffix" field.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Role has a valid name
scan_table_check.resolution_details: If the name is missing or invalid, it should be set to a valid name - i.e. the suffix for roles defined in scoped applications.
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - Role has a valid name
